overview: “Before co-founding Elucidon (Silobreakerâ€™s parent), Kristofer spent 15 years in banking and financial services. He was a Vice-President in the equity derivatives group at Salomon Brothers in London and the Managing Director of AIG Financial Products in London. His entry into technology, other than that as user, was in 2000 in the role of acting CEO for an early stage technology project originated and controlled by the Boston Consulting Group and OMX in Stockholm. He holds a Master of Science degree in Economics and Business Administration from the Stockholm School of Economics.” (Source: Silobreaker)
